::Grounded::
Grounded gets back to the entrance of hte base BH still being dragged
behind him with vines.  Grounded transforms to robot mode and touches
his arm to the ground. Concentrating very hard his arm glows green.
Vines begin to shoot up out of the ground and begins to grow around
the shield.  Soon all that would be visible would be a alrge dome made
of vines that would be 4 feet thick and very dense. HE stays there
outside his arm pulsing with energy and vines growing.
